definitions.text: a message that tells the particulars of an act or occurrence or course of events; presented in writing or drama or cinema or as a radio or television program
examples: Disney's stories entertain adults as well as children

definitions.text: a piece of fiction that narrates a chain of related events
examples: he writes stories for the magazines

definitions.text: a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
examples: what level is the office on?

definitions.text: a record or narrative description of past events
examples: he gave an inaccurate account of the plot to kill the president
the story of exposure to lead

definitions.text: a short account of the news
examples: the story was on the 11 o'clock news
the account of his speech that was given on the evening news made the governor furious
he told a fib about eating his spinach
how can I stop my child from telling stories?
